summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.6°C) and outside temperature (down 4.3°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 15%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 460 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 285 m), and outside humidity (down 7%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, dry and less humid conditions and slight breezes. Drizzle or light rain possible, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and it’s dim outside. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
